did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Reprints of articles by Beverly Willis concerning architecture, city planning, historic preservation and restoration, and the use of computers in the fields of architecture and planning.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Member, International Fraternity of Lambda Alpha, Golden Gate Chapter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Reprints of articles by Beverly Willis concerning architecture, city planning, historic preservation and restoration, and the use of computers in the fields of architecture and planning.
